title: Lưu Viết Hải - A Coding Guy

items.title: Hello World
items.content_text:
Hi! My name is Hải, or you can call me Leo. And this is my personal site. Hope you like it.
from datetime import datetime  class Coder:  name = None  nickname = None  country = None  year_of_exp = None  languages = ()  databases = ()   def work(self):  print("My back hurts..... (●︿●)")  me = Coder() me.name = "Lưu Viết Hải" me.
